/.intro: I possess substantial expertise in Next.js, .NET, and Flutter.Most of my projects are posted on my GitHub - myworldbox. Please feel free to refer to take a look.As a fervent enthusiast of the intricate fields of full-stack development and algorithmic trading, I have obtained a degree in Computer Engineering at HKUST. With an ardent desire to excel in my chosen career path, I am wholeheartedly compelled to pursue this opportunity with unwavering dedication.My portfolio of accomplishments as a full-stack developer includes noteworthy contributions to influential associations such as AWS Educate, HKUST Path Advisor, and USThing. Furthermore, I have also been bestowed with the HKT300 seed fund, for my pioneering project, UniLetsBeFd.It is with great eagerness that I express my earnest desire to seize this opportunity, which will provide me with invaluable practical insights and enable me to augment my skill set.
